name: @taqueria/protocol
description: A TypeScript package which contains types that are to be shared between @taqueria/node-sdk and @taqueria/taqueria.

scripts.backup-config: cp package.json package.json.orig && cp package-lock.json package-lock.json.orig
scripts.restore-config: mv package.json.orig package.json && mv package-lock.json.orig package-lock.json
scripts.prod-config: npm run backup-config && npm run update-sdk-version && npm run update-sdk-version-lock
scripts.build-prod: npm run backup-config && npm run prod-config && npm run build && npm run restore-config

author: ECAD Labs
